name: Yoni's Adventure
description:
Yoni's Adventure is an experience focused on different ways to play it, but more important: we want you to have fun!

Control:

Main Menu: Full Keyboard to move around

Lunch Time: Hold space to swallow and grow; Release Space Button to eject the objects in your mouth

Talking Jonys: Use your mic and shush the yoni's to stop bothering you.
